hero.headline: When a weekly report is ready, generate video
hero.subheadline: Connect weekly report events to programmatic video generation.

problem.title: Weekly reports stop at dashboards
bullets: Stakeholders don't open dashboards every week.
PDF summaries get skimmed or ignored.
Manual recaps take time and delay insights.
Teams need a consistent narrative format.

solution.title: Map weekly report events to video
bullets: Trigger a webhook or job when the report is ready.
Send JSON to /render with a template id.
Deliver the video to users or stakeholders.

steps.title: Send JSON
steps.body: POST to /render with your API key.

steps.title: Render async
steps.body: Queue and render reliably at scale.

steps.title: Deliver
steps.body: Receive the MP4 URL via webhook.
